longDescription:
Teachlr Organizations is a comprehensive training platform designed for corporate learning and development. Our user-friendly interface allows organizations to create, manage, and deliver engaging training programs that enhance employee skills.
With Teachlr, you can develop interactive courses using multimedia formats, including videos, audio, documents, and quizzes. The platform supports importing pre-designed courses and creating customized learning paths to meet specific training needs.
Teachlr fosters collaboration through group creation and sub-portals, enriching the training experience with gamification and interactive elements. Advanced reporting features enable administrators to track progress and assess learner performance effectively.
Fully adaptable to mobile devices, Teachlr ensures learners can access training materials anytime, anywhere, while maintaining robust security.
Visit our website and fill out the form for a personalized demo today!

name: itslearning
longDescription:
itslearning is an online learning platform designed for teaching. We are Nordic in spirit and by design. Our focus is to deliver an intuitive LMS, empowering educators and students.

Our platform helps you plan for successful learning. It's easy to create lessons and resources that engage students, and to streamline common teaching tasks - allowing more time to teach. Teachers get actionable insights about student progress to help better personalise instruction.
pricingDetails: Contact itslearning for pricing details

name: Blue
longDescription: Measuring employee engagement has become critical for organizations striving to enhance performance and retain talent. By identifying key factors that influence employee satisfaction, organizations can implement targeted strategies to boost engagement levels, leading to increased productivity while fostering a more stable and motivated workforce.\n\nThat’s why Explorance Blue for engagement surveys gives organizations the ability to collect highest quality insights to confidently identify engagement drivers and areas of improvements, and quickly take action to align employee experience with the company value proposition.
pricingDetails: Flexible pricing models depending on the particular use case and budgetary requirements, contact for full quote.

name: LanSchool
longDescription: With LanSchool, teachers manage multiple activities in one central location, so they can focus on enabling learning instead of managing devices. Monitoring and protection features like thumbnail/fullscreen monitoring and web limiting help teachers keep student learning on track while communication and collaboration features like messaging and teacher/student screen broadcasting enable high quality learning. Our goal is to empower educators to deliver the best student outcomes.
pricingDetails: Contact Lenovo directly for pricing information.
